Oil is a great, useless substance. It is great in that it is the only resouce in the ME readily convereted to cash and ther eis no lack of market for it. It is a fairly worthless substance on its own because you cannot ewat it, you cannot drink it, and it makes poor houses (very difficult to get nails to stick). 
 
 The "secure oil supply" excuse beign passed around is largley a load of bunk. They have oil, and not muxch else, and we are willing to pay big bucks for it. End of story.

 
 But it'll keep you warm at night!
 
 Yes, I believe also that the primary reason for occupying Iraq was to build permanent bases there. I also think that occupying the second largest oil reserve was also a major reason. Wouldn't it be nice for American/British oil companies to just pump up their own oil from Iraq than buying it from them or OPEC? It sure beats drilling in the open ocean and prospecting in wilderness reserves. At least it looked that way on paper 2 years ago.
 
 
 
Not to be offensive but if the US invades or attacks Iran without just cause (ie Iran has nukes and is going to use them vs the US in the next 24 hrs) I would help in the terrorist operations.

 
 "Just cause" can always be invented. Data can always be mined.
 The problem will be in convincing the people a second time that pre-emption is warranted.
